definition: to record/to note/to memorize/to remember/mark/sign/classifier for blows, kicks, shots
to do/to grow/to write or compose/to pretend/to regard as/to feel/writings or works

sentences.english: It was the apple, x0 and I call that position x zero.
sentences.chinese: 原來是蘋果的位置，記作。

sentences.english: Shall this technical foul be penalized as a coach's foul?
sentences.chinese: 是否將這個技術犯規記作教練員的犯規？

sentences.english: The magnetic field induces an electrical voltage in the wire that is counter to the voltage of the circuit as a whole.
sentences.chinese: 磁場誘發線纜內的電壓被記作線路整體的電壓。
